name: Nova 2 Meeting
description: Optimized for conference room settings with multiple speakers and a single listen.

name: Nova 2 Phone Call
description: Optimized for low-bandwidth audio phone calls.

name: Nova 2 Voicemail
description: Optimized for low-bandwidth audio clips with a single speaker. Derived from the phonecall model.

name: Nova 2 Finance
description: Optimized for multiple speakers with varying audio quality, such as on earnings calls. Finance-oriented vocabulary.

name: Nova 2 Conversational AI
description: Optimized for human-bot interactions like IVR, voice assistants, or automated kiosks.

name: Nova 2 Video
description: Optimized for audio sourced from videos.

name: Nova 2 Medical
description: Optimized for audio with medical-oriented vocabulary.

name: Nova 2 Drive-Thru
description: Optimized for audio sources from drive-thrus.

name: Nova 2 Automotive
description: Optimized for audio with automotive-oriented vocabulary.

name: Nova 2 ATC
description: Optimized for air traffic control communications.
